mapper.update: update review set review_title=#{review_title} , review_content=#{review_content} where review_num=#{review_num}
mapper.insert: insert into review (prod_num , review_title, review_content , review_create_date) values(#{prod_num}, #{review_title} , #{review_content} , now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where prod_num= #{prod_num}

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from (select * from review where prod_num= #{prod_num} order by review_num desc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
